H0.text: Crude oil is more available due to improvements in deep-sea drilling technology.

H1.text: Fresh water is more available due to improvements in deep‑sea drilling technology.

H2.text: Thermal energy is the resource that has become more available due to improvements in deep‑sea drilling technology.

H3.text: Salt reserves are more available due to improvements in deep‑sea drilling technology.

A4.text: The combination of horizontal drilling and hydraulic fracturing has resulted in a significant increase in production from previously uneconomic plays.
